description:
Uzume meets a young girl into Gothic clothing named Miina, and for some reason she calls her dolls her masters. Minna had hoped to become a doll herself, after being impressed at the loyalty displayed by the dolls. Akari finds herself having to choose between Minna and Uzume.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akari Kari Kari: Restrictions and Devotion?
小明かりかり 拘束と献身?
